TITLE: TURBOCHARGED ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: With a restless 258 lb-ft of torque and  237 hp, the turbocharged engine brings the stampede. Giddy-up.

TITLE: 9-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: The 9-speed automatic transmission helps deliver immediate power and efficient performance at a moment’s notice. Like right now.

TITLE: TWIN-CLUTCH ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Like a beautiful symphony, the sophisticated twin-clutch AWD system orchestrates control by delivering torque to the wheels that need it most. Music to our ears.

TITLE: SELECTABLE DRIVE MODES
DESCRIPTION: With selectable drive modes such as Tour, Sport and Snow/Ice, the XT4 can adapt to the road like it was born to be there. Because it was.

TITLE: ACTIVE SPORT SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The available Active Sport Suspension uses Continuous Damping Real-Time Control to adjust the chassis tuning at each wheel every two milliseconds, for exceptional ride and handling. Feel that? Nope.

TITLE: INTUITIVE CONTROLS
DESCRIPTION: With a tactile Rotary Infotainment Controller and an intuitive instrument panel layout, the world is in the palm of your hand. High-five to that.

TITLE: DEVICE PAIRING
DESCRIPTION: Dual Bluetooth®† connectivity and NFC† “one-touch” phone pairing are like having the world’s best co-pilot. Only this one doesn’t always change the radio station.

TITLE: INSPIRED STYLE
DESCRIPTION: Your road. Your style. With authentic interior decor choices and a keen attention to every last detail, the XT4 is tailored to you. And it’s a perfect fit.

TITLE: FRONT LUMBAR MASSAGING SEATS
DESCRIPTION: Turn every drive into a luxurious experience with available front massaging seats that include heat and ventilation. Any more luxurious and you’d need to take a spa day.

TITLE: INTERIOR SPACE
DESCRIPTION: The 39.5” of segment-leading rear leg room, along with versatile cargo space behind the 60/40 folding rear seats, means there’s room for all your friends. And all their baggage.

TITLE: AVAILABLE HANDS-FREE POWER LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: No free hands? No problem. The available Hands-Free Power Liftgate uses a foot sensor underneath the rear of the XT4 to access the trunk with ease. Open, sesame.

TITLE: AVAILABLE ROOF RAILS
DESCRIPTION: With available roof rails that can be used to transport large gear, the XT4 is raising the level of adventure. To the roof.

TITLE: 18″ ALLOY WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: Turning heads comes standard with 18” alloy wheels. Premium Luxury and Sport models offer an available 20″ of distinction of distinction.

TITLE: SIGNATURE LED LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: With signature LED lighting standard in both the front and the rear, you’ll always shine. Even in the dark.

TITLE: SPORT GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: Aggressively stylish, the high gloss Sport Grille breaks free from ordinary.

TITLE: LED TAILLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: With iconic LED Taillamps, you’ll always stand out.

TITLE: With a restless 258 lb-ft of torque and  237 hp, the turbocharged engine brings the stampede. Giddy-up.
DESCRIPTION: The 9-speed automatic transmission helps deliver immediate power and efficient performance at a moment’s notice. Like right now.

TITLE: PEACE OF MIND COMES STANDARD
DESCRIPTION: Eight standard airbags†, Rollover Sensing and available OnStar Automatic Airbag† Notification provide additional peace of mind.

TITLE: ONSTAR
DESCRIPTION: Drive with added confidence knowing an OnStar Advisor is available to help 24/7. Purchase a new properly equipped Cadillac vehicle and receive 2 years of OnStar Safety & Security coverage†, a 2-year trial of navigation services†, up to 1 year†of Remote Access services†, and 3 GB or 3 months of data†, whichever comes first.

TITLE: GRABS YOUR ATTENTION. SUBTLY.
DESCRIPTION: The available Safety Alert Seat sends a discreet pulse to the left, right or both sides of the driver’s seat, indicating the direction of the potential danger.

TITLE: GAIN PRECIOUS TIME
DESCRIPTION: Available automatic braking systems can help in potential collision situations by automatically applying the brakes if the driver has not already done so.

TITLE: POWER THAT PERFORMS
DESCRIPTION: An all-new turbocharged engine delivers 237 hp and 258 lb-ft of torque.

TITLE: ALL ACCELERATION
DESCRIPTION: A sophisticated 9-speed automatic transmission provides both efficiency and intelligent power delivery, enhancing your drive.

TITLE: THE POWER OF CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: A sophisticated twin-clutch AWD system directs power to the wheels where it’s needed for enhanced handling on your next adventure.

TITLE: OWN ANY KIND OF ROAD
DESCRIPTION: Adapt to the road or conquer it with selectable driving modes for both AWD and FWD models.

TITLE: SLICE THROUGH DESIGN
DESCRIPTION: Striking new front and rear LED signature lighting remain distinctively Cadillac.

TITLE: STRIKING WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: The eye-catching XT4 comes standard with 18" alloy wheels. Available Premium Luxury and Sport models offer 20 inches of distinction.

TITLE: WHEN ADVENTURE CALLS, XT4 ANSWERS
DESCRIPTION: With available roof rails that can be used to support bikes and other items, an escape is a must.

TITLE: FIRST-CLASS COMFORT FOR ALL
DESCRIPTION: A thoughtfully created interior provides segment-leading rear leg room and knee clearance for backseat passengers.

TITLE: ROOM FOR POSSIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: The XT4 allows for ample cargo room behind the 60/40 folding rear seats for additional versatility.

TITLE: PLENTY OF STORAGE SPACE
DESCRIPTION: There are more than six storage areas in the front-floor console alone. There’s even a special place for your umbrella cleverly designed into the front door panels.

TITLE: SIT BACK AND RELAX
DESCRIPTION: The luxurious interior features available massaging front seats with heat and ventilation for a more relaxing drive.

TITLE: ROTARY CONTROLLER
DESCRIPTION: Intuitive controls let you adjust your drive with simple motions.

TITLE: ACTIVE SPORT SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The available Active Sport Suspension uses Continuous Damping Control technology to adjust the damping for each wheel every two milliseconds, helping provide a more precise and comfortable drive.

TITLE: REAR CAMERA MIRROR†
DESCRIPTION: The available Rear Camera Mirror streams rear-facing video while driving that expands to provide a wider, less obstructed rear field of view than a traditional mirror. Simply touch a button to revert back to a traditional rearview mirror.

TITLE: IN-CAR DELIVERY
DESCRIPTION: Amazon Prime members can now take convenience one step further with free in-car delivery from Key by Amazon†. Receive your Amazon packages securely delivered right into your vehicle.

TITLE: ENGINE PERFORMANCE
DESCRIPTION: The 3.6L V6 engine, available on Premium Luxury and standard on Sport trim, is designed to stand out with 310 hp and 271 lb-ft of torque. The 2.0L engine, standard on Luxury and Premium Luxury trim, has 237 hp and 258 lb-ft of torque with innovative technologies like Active Fuel Management.

TITLE: 9-SPEED ELECTRONIC PRECISION SHIFT
DESCRIPTION: Electronic Precision Shift moves you from Park to Drive in a simple gesture. It also puts you in command of an advanced 9-speed automatic transmission that is both efficient and responsive.

TITLE: DRIVER-SELECTABLE MODES
DESCRIPTION: Not only does the XT5 respond to changing road conditions, it adapts to you. All-Wheel Drive, with four distinct calibrations, and Front-Wheel Drive, with three distinct calibrations, support different driving dynamics. All with just the press of a button.

TITLE: SPORT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Built exclusively for spirited driving enthusiasts; our sport trim features everything the intrepid driver could want; Electronic Precision Shift, twin-clutch Sport Control AWD and a heavy-duty cooling system.

TITLE: REAL-TIME DAMPING
DESCRIPTION: Every two milliseconds, available Real-Time Damping adjusts the suspension to road and driving conditions for a more calculated and comfortable ride. That’s picture perfect precision.

TITLE: STABILITRAK
DESCRIPTION: During low-traction conditions like rain, snow or gravel, Stabilitrak automatically applies brake pressure and reduces engine torque to keep you on your intended path.

TITLE: INTERIOR ENVIRONMENT
DESCRIPTION: An interior fit for greatness. Cadillac designers equipped the XT5 cabin with authentic materials including cut-and-sewn leather, natural woods or carbon fiber trim with Galvano accents for a strong finish.

TITLE: RECONFIGURABLE SPACE
DESCRIPTION: 60/40 rear seats can be folded flat to provide up to 63 cubic feet of space.† And with split-fold functionaly, nothing gets left behind.

TITLE: CADILLAC USER EXPERIENCE†
DESCRIPTION: With access to phone, radio and a library of additional apps†, the world is in the palm of your hand, at the tip of your finger and the sound of your voice. You are now arriving at your destination — the future.

TITLE: PHONE INTEGRATION
DESCRIPTION: Truly your co-pilot. Apple CarPlay™† and Android Auto™† compatibility means you can seamlessly access your contacts, apps, playlists and more with intelligent phone integration like never before.

TITLE: ULTRAVIEW SUNROOF
DESCRIPTION: The available UltraView sunroof serves you and your passengers stunning views from both the front and rear seats.

TITLE: HEATED STEERING WHEEL
DESCRIPTION: Turn a chilly morning commute into a comfortable drive. With the push of a button, the available heated steering wheel turns warm to the touch.

TITLE: STYLED TO TURN HEADS
DESCRIPTION: Make an entrance. The new distinctive grille designs and finishes offer the XT5 a new face, as sharp lines and sweeping curves meet jewel-like head and taillamps for unquestionable style.

TITLE: VISIONARY LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: Our jewel-like headlamps aren’t mere ornamentation. Our Standard LED headlamps feature IntelliBeam®, which automatically switches between high and low beams as vehicles approach, while cornering lamps cast light into corners as you take them.

TITLE: 20” ALLOY WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: Available 20” alloy wheels make a statement no matter what type of road you’re taking on.

TITLE: The 3.6L V6 engine, available on Premium Luxury and standard on Sport trim, is designed to stand out with 310 hp and 271 lb-ft of torque. The 2.0L engine, standard on Luxury and Premium Luxury trim, has 237 hp and 258 lb-ft of torque with innovative technologies like Active Fuel Management.

TITLE: LANE CHANGE ALERT WITH SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert monitors your blind spots and flashes a warning when it detects vehicles hidden from view.

TITLE: ONSTAR
DESCRIPTION: Drive with added confidence knowing an OnStar Advisor is available to help 24/7. Purchase a new properly equipped Cadillac vehicle and receive 2 years of OnStar Safety & Security coverage†, a 2-year trial of navigation services†, up to 1 year† of Remote Access services†, and 3 GB or 3 months of data†, whichever comes first.

TITLE: SURROUND VISION
DESCRIPTION: Available Surround Vision provides a bird’s-eye view of the area immediately surrounding the vehicle when in low-speed Drive or Reverse. This view, projected on the infotainment screen, helps increase your awareness when parking.

TITLE: FRONT PEDESTRIAN BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Available Front Pedestrian Braking scans the road ahead and alerts you, or may brake automatically, when a pedestrian is detected.

TITLE: CADILLAC USER EXPERIENCE†
DESCRIPTION: Connects you with the world around you to make driving easier and more enjoyable.

TITLE: A MORE CONNECTED DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Cadillac user experience† with phone integration offers Apple CarPlay™† compatibility. Access Siri™, Apple Music™, contacts and more from your iPhone® with a touch of the vehicle screen.

TITLE: BE ENVELOPED BY PREMIUM SOUND
DESCRIPTION: The available Bose14-speaker Studio Surround Sound System features 14 speakers for exceptional sound quality.

TITLE: CONNECT TO WHAT MATTERS MOST
DESCRIPTION: Available Cadillac 4G LTE built-in Wi-Fi® hotspot† lets you connect up to 7 devices from as far as 50 feet away while the vehicle is on or in the ACC position. Includes data trial for 3 months or 3GB, whichever comes first.

TITLE: BRAWN WITH BRAINS
DESCRIPTION: With 310 hp and 271 lb-ft of torque the 3.6L V6 engine is powerful, but that’s not the whole story. Innovative technologies like Active Fuel Management and Auto Stop/Start make it efficient, too.

TITLE: 8-SPEEDS, ELECTRONICALLY CONTROLLED
DESCRIPTION: Electronic Precision Shift moves you from Park to Drive in a simple gesture. It also puts you in command of an advanced 8-speed automatic transmission that is both efficient and responsive.

TITLE: AVAILABLE DRIVER-SELECTABLE MODES
DESCRIPTION: Three distinct driver modes give you control of the driving experience. Take control even further with available All-Wheel Drive for, confident handling across varying conditions.

TITLE: COMFORT IN CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: The leather-wrapped steering wheel offers power tilt, telescoping and available heating to enhance your drive.

TITLE: RECONFIGURABLE SPACE
DESCRIPTION: 40/20/40 folding rear seats can be folded flat to reveal up to 63 cubic feet of space.†

TITLE: ULTRAVIEW SUNROOF
DESCRIPTION: The available UltraView® Power Sunroof spans both seating rows, providing every passenger a clear view of the sky.

TITLE: FRONT PEDESTRIAN BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: The Front Pedestrian Braking system alerts you via haptic seat feedback and automatically applies the brakes or enhances driver braking to reduce collision severity or even avoid detected imminent pedestrian collisions.

TITLE: NIGHT VISION
DESCRIPTION: With available Night Vision, infrared sensors locate and notify you of potential hazards up ahead, so you can drive more confidently in the dark.

TITLE: LANE KEEP ASSIST
DESCRIPTION: Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning can provide gentle steering wheel nudges or haptic seat feedback to help avoid unintentional lane drifting.

TITLE: LANE CHANGE ALERT WITH SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert can provide side-mirror alerts or haptic seat feedback when a moving vehicle is detected in or rapidly approaching your side blind zone.

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Forward Collision Alert can alert you via haptic seat feedback if it detects a front-end collision is imminent with a vehicle you are following. It also alerts you if you are following much too closely.

TITLE: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Rear Cross Traffic Alert can alert you via haptic seat feedback to detected left- or right-cross traffic behind you when in Reverse.

TITLE: 3.6L V6 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Equipped with a powerfully advanced V6 engine, including Variable Valve Timing and Active Fuel Management, prepare to shift your expectations into high-gear.

TITLE: 9-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: The all-new 9-speed automatic transmission is optimized for efficiency and precise torque delivery so you’re the one in control.

TITLE: DRIVE MODES
DESCRIPTION: Not only does the XT6 respond to changing road conditions, with unique calibrations to support different driving dynamics, it adapts to you. All with just the press of a button.

TITLE: REFINED SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: Suspend your suspension disbelief. The Premium Luxury trim comes with an Active Sport Chassis system that gives you a ride that’s both engaging and spirited.

TITLE: SPORT CONTROL AWD
DESCRIPTION: Leave no destination out of reach. The Sport trim comes with Sport Control AWD, providing a unique calibration with active suspension and a faster steering rack for an all-around more exhilarating experience. Now get out there.

TITLE: SMART TOW TRAILERING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: Now just about everyone and everything can come along for the ride. Tow up to 4,000 pounds† with ease using the available Smart Tow Trailering System.

DESCRIPTION: Full LED Light Blade taillamps emit thin blades of light that give the Escalade an unmistakable signature at night.

TITLE: AVAILABLE 22-INCH POLISHED ALLOY WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: Make a statement. The 22-inch polished aluminum wheels are cast-formed to minimize weight while gaining strength and second looks.

TITLE: AVAILABLE POWER ASSIST STEPS
DESCRIPTION: Open one of the doors and the available Power Assist Steps lower to greet you.

TITLE: HANDS-FREE LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: The Hands-Free Liftgate opens and closes with a simple kicking gesture, even when your hands are full.

TITLE: INVISIBLE REAR WIPER
DESCRIPTION: The rear wiper conceals itself to stay protected from the elements, while preserving the rear design.

TITLE: CONCIERGE LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: Standard Concierge Lighting includes LEDs in the door handles, side view mirrors and interior, providing clear illumination upon exit and approach.

DESCRIPTION: Surround Vision provides a bird’s-eye view of the area immediately surrounding the vehicle when in low-speed Drive or Reverse. This view, projected onto the Cadillac user experience screen, helps increase your awareness when parking.

TITLE: ENHANCED AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Enhanced Automatic Emergency Braking can automatically engage your brakes when it senses a potential front-end  collision and the driver has not already applied the brakes.

TITLE: SAFETY ALERT SEAT
DESCRIPTION: Our patented Safety Alert Seat provides you the option of getting directional seat vibrations instead of beeps for potential threat alerts.

DESCRIPTION: Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning can provide gentle steering wheel nudges to help avoid unintentional lane drifting.

DESCRIPTION: Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert can provide side-mirror alerts when a moving vehicle is detected in or rapidly approaching your side blind zone.

DESCRIPTION: Forward Collision Alert can alert you if it detects a front-end collision is imminent with a vehicle you are following. It also alerts you if you are following much too closely.

TITLE: 10-SPEED AUTOMATIC
DESCRIPTION: The 10-speed automatic transmission delivers near-instantaneous shifts for smooth acceleration and optimal power in any gear.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT PERFORMANCE
DESCRIPTION: The 420-hp 6.2L V8 engine offers technologies such as Continuous Variable Valve Timing, Direct Injection and Active Fuel Management to ensure power is harnessed efficiently.

TITLE: READS THE ROAD 1,000 TIMES PER SECOND
DESCRIPTION: Balance and control. Magnetic Ride Control reads the road up to 1,000 times per second and automatically adjusts the suspension to road conditions.

TITLE: 4-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Get power where you need it most. Effortlessly shift between 2WD, 4WD HI, 4WD LOW and AUTO to manage the road ahead.

TITLE: STABILITRAK®
DESCRIPTION: Enhanced control. StabiliTrak selectively applies braking pressure to any one of the vehicle wheel brakes to assist the driver in keeping the vehicle on the intended path.

TITLE: READY FOR THE LONG HAUL
DESCRIPTION: Pull your own weight, and then some. The standard Trailering Package provides a staggering 8300-lb trailering capacity.†

DESCRIPTION: With the Cadillac user experience†, you’ve never had more power at the tip of your fingers and at the sound of your voice.

DESCRIPTION: The CT4 can see and help you avoid the things you may miss with available active safety features like Forward Collision Alert†, Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert†, Rear Cross Traffic Alert† and Automatic Emergency Braking†.

DESCRIPTION: Front seats are first-class with numerous available adjustments and available heat, ventilation, lumbar massage, and driver memory settings all to optimize your comfort.

TITLE: AUTHENTIC MATERIALS
DESCRIPTION: Tailored with authentic materials, including real wood trim and supple available Semi-Aniline leather. Curated for style and comfort for the road ahead.

TITLE: COMFORT YOUR WAY
DESCRIPTION: Available 20-way adjustable heated and ventilated front seats are sculpted for ultimate performance, and wrapped in available Semi-Aniline leather for maximum comfort.

TITLE: CLIMATE TAILORED TO ALL
DESCRIPTION: Available Tri-Zone Climate Control allows the driver, front and rear passengers to adjust temperatures individually.

TITLE: CADILLAC USER EXPERIENCE†
DESCRIPTION:
Connects you with the world around you to make driving easier and more enjoyable. 
 CONNECTED†  Available connectivity gives you apps, maps, weather, music and more.  PERSONALIZED  Customized, one-of-a-kind driver profiles. 
  
UP-TO-DATE Receive updates with the latest available software.

TITLE: A MORE CONNECTED DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Cadillac user experience† with phone integration offers Apple CarPlay™† compatibility. Access siri™, Apple Music™, contacts and more from your iPhone® with a touch of the vehicle screen.

TITLE: TECHNOLOGY TAILORED TO YOU
DESCRIPTION: The available Reconfigurable Display lets you customize what's displayed—speed, navigation, audio and more—on the beautiful 12.3-inch LCD display.

TITLE: SURROUND VISION
DESCRIPTION: Available Surround Vision displays a bird's eye view to help you during low-speed maneuvering.

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available Forward Collision Alert monitors detected traffic ahead and warns you of potential hazards.

TITLE: LANE CHANGE ALERT WITH SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert† provides side-mirror alerts to help you avoid moving vehicles detected in, or rapidly approaching, your side blind zone during a lane-change maneuver.

TITLE: LANE KEEP ASSIST WITH LANE DEPARTURE WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning† helps you stay in your driving lane by providing gentle steering wheel turns to help you avoid crashes due to unintentionally drifting out of your lane when you are not actively steering and your turn signal is not activated.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Available Low Speed Forward Automatic Braking and available Forward and Reverse Automatic Braking can engage your brakes when they sense a potential collision and you have not already applied the brakes.

TITLE: LANE KEEP ASSIST WITH LANE DEPARTURE WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning helps you stay in your driving lane.

TITLE: LANE CHANGE ALERT WITH SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert illuminates the side-mirror warning icons to alert you of detected rapidly approaching vehicles and vehicles in your blind spots during a lane-change maneuver.

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available Forward Collision Alert monitors traffic ahead, alerting you if a potential front-end collision is imminent, while the available Following Distance Indicator shows the following time to the detected vehicle ahead in seconds.

TITLE: CADILLAC USER EXPERIENCE†
DESCRIPTION:
Connects you with the world around you to make driving easier and more enjoyable. 
  
CONNECTED† Available connectivity gives you apps, maps, weather, music and more. 
  
PERSONALIZED Customized, one-of-a-kind driver profiles. 
  
UP-TO-DATE Receive updates with the latest available software.

TITLE: A MORE CONNECTED DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Cadillac user experience† with phone integration offers Apple CarPlay™† compatibility. Access Siri, Apple Music™, contacts and more from your iPhone® with a touch of the vehicle screen.

TITLE: BE ENVELOPED BY SOUND
DESCRIPTION: The available 14-speaker Bose Studio Surround Sound® system is optimized specifically for the XTS and offers exceptional audio clarity.

TITLE: CUSTOMIZE YOUR VIEW
DESCRIPTION: The available full-color reconfigurable gauge cluster and available Head-Up Display place speed, navigation, audio and phone information in the driver's clear view.

TITLE: POWER YOU CAN FEEL
DESCRIPTION:
The standard 304-hp 3.6L V6 engine features Direct Injection for power and efficiency. Opt for the available V-Sport Platinum 410-hp Twin Turbo 3.6L V6 and command its exhilarating performance. 
  
304-HP / 264 LB-FT 3.6L V6  410-HP / 369 LB-FT V-Sport Platinum Twin Turbo 3.6L V6

TITLE: READS THE ROAD 1,000 TIMES PER SECOND
DESCRIPTION: Balance and control. Available Magnetic Ride Control reads the road up to 1,000 times per second and automatically adjusts to road surfaces and weather conditions.

TITLE: HIGHER LEVEL OF CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Available All-Wheel Drive maximizes stability and handling, delivering impeccable control in less than perfect driving conditions.

TITLE: SURROUND YOURSELF WITH SAFETY
DESCRIPTION: Features such as; Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert, Forward Collision Alert, and Front Pedestrian Braking add peace of mind to every drive.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: The Automatic Emergency Braking can sense imminent collisions and can automatically engage the brakes.

TITLE: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: When in reverse, Rear Cross Traffic Alert warns of oncoming cross traffic from either side of your vehicle with a visible alert and a pulse from the Safety Alert Seat.

TITLE: HANDCRAFTED MATERIALS
DESCRIPTION: From the available real wood veneers to carbon fiber trim, every detail of the interior has been expertly obsessed over.

TITLE: INDULGENT SEATING
DESCRIPTION: Platinum models serve additional comforts with both outboard heated and ventilated front and rear seats, and 15 unique massage settings up front. Even the rear seats finish first. With generous leg room, passengers have ample space to relax for hours on end.

TITLE: BOSE PANARAY
DESCRIPTION: The 34-speaker Bose Panaray audio system, standard on Premium Luxury and Platinum, turns the CT6 into a moving symphony.

TITLE: STRIKING EXTERIOR
DESCRIPTION: Agile and responsive, the CT6 is engineered with advanced materials to invigorate every drive. From tight cornering to open roads, every drive is exhilarating.

TITLE: LIGHTWEIGHT ARCHITECTURE
DESCRIPTION: The lightweight CT6 architecture is at the core of its agile handling. With 12 new patents and an aluminum structure that weighs 220 lbs. less than steel, the CT6 has innovative bones.

TITLE: SIGNATURE LAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Signature headlamps are a key facet of the vehicle’s silhouette. They employ bi-LED high-/low-beam projectors to help increase visibility. The taillamps mirror the front design, but present a rear exterior that is stylish and unmistakably Cadillac.

TITLE: WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: Stand out from the wheels up. Our selection of 20" wheels are standard on the Premium Luxury and Platinum model.

TITLE: Features such as; Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert, Forward Collision Alert, and Front Pedestrian Braking add peace of mind to every drive.
DESCRIPTION: The Automatic Emergency Braking can sense imminent collisions and can automatically engage the brakes.

TITLE: From the available real wood veneers to carbon fiber trim, every detail of the interior has been expertly obsessed over.
DESCRIPTION: Platinum models serve additional comforts with both outboard heated and ventilated front and rear seats, and 15 unique massage settings up front. Even the rear seats finish first. With generous leg room, passengers have ample space to relax for hours on end.

TITLE: Agile and responsive, the CT6 is engineered with advanced materials to invigorate every drive. From tight cornering to open roads, every drive is exhilarating.
DESCRIPTION: The lightweight CT6 architecture is at the core of its agile handling. With 12 new patents and an aluminum structure that weighs 220 lbs. less than steel, the CT6 has innovative bones.

TITLE: TECH TO TAKE YOUR HANDS AND BREATH AWAY
DESCRIPTION: Meet Super Cruise,† the world’s first true hands-free driver assistance feature for compatible highways. The available Super Cruise feature uses precision LiDAR mapping, a state-of-the-art Driver Attention System and a network of cameras and radar sensors to make long drives, or even your daily commute, a little easier.

TITLE: A MOVING ENTERTAINMENT CENTER
DESCRIPTION: The available Rear Seat Infotainment system features articulating 10" diagonal screens and connectivity for your personal devices including streaming Wi-Fi®† for your phone, tablet or laptop, as well as HDMI and USB† ports.

TITLE: EVERYONE IS CONNECTED
DESCRIPTION: The available 4G LTE Wi-Fi® Hotspot† allows you to connect up to seven devices at the same time, up to 50 feet away, so your passengers can check their email or watch their favorite entertainment.

TITLE: A POWERFUL DECISION
DESCRIPTION:
The CT6 is dedicated to performance with three different engine selections, each paired with a 10-speed Hydra-Matic transmission that makes shifting among gears fast, responsive and intelligent.   
 
 3.6L naturally aspirated V6 pushes 335 hp for an aggressive ride 
 3.0L Twin Turbo V6 wields 404 hp for pure exhilaration 
 4.2L Blackwing Twin Turbo V8 with 500 hp†

TITLE: DRIVEN BY INNOVATION
DESCRIPTION: The lightweight CT6 architecture is at the core of its agile handling. With stats such as 220 pounds saved over traditional steel construction, 62 percent aluminum structure and 12 new patents, the CT6 has innovative bones.

TITLE: MAXIMUM CAPABILITY
DESCRIPTION: With the available Active Chassis Package, every wheel drives, steers and, with Magnetic Ride Control, adjusts vertical suspension damping within milliseconds, offering you exceptional maneuverability.

TITLE: DESIGN YOU’RE DRIVEN TO
DESCRIPTION: Strength and style are complemented by a powerful stance and iconic vertical lighting. Lines, curves and sweeping planes seamlessly mesh.

TITLE: SLICE-THROUGH LAMP DESIGN
DESCRIPTION: Signature headlamps are a key facet of the vehicle’s silhouette. They employ bi-LED high-/low-beam projectors to help increase visibility. The taillamps mirror the front design, but present a rear exterior that is stylish and unmistakably Cadillac.

TITLE: 20" OF DISTINCTION
DESCRIPTION: Stand out from the wheels up. 20" Ultra Bright wheels are available on the Premium Luxury and Sport models, and 20" twin 5-spoke alloy wheels with Manoogian finish are available on the Platinum model.

TITLE: STYLED FOR ADRENALINE
DESCRIPTION: Athletic in appearance, and in action. The CT6’s unique grille, ground effects and dark trim complement its agile, sporty spirit.

TITLE: DETAILS THAT CAPTURE ATTENTION
DESCRIPTION: The interior is packed with modern comforts, curated aesthetics and savvy controls. From its range of elegant materials and environments, such as real wood veneers or carbon fiber trim, to its superior amenities, the space inside evokes a new level of craftsmanship.

TITLE: A SEAT UNLIKE ANY OTHER
DESCRIPTION: Platinum models serve additional comforts with both heated and ventilated front and rear seats, and 15 unique massage settings up front. Even the rear seats finish first. With generous leg room, passengers have ample space to relax for hours on end.

TITLE: WHEN NO FEWER THAN 34 SPEAKERS WILL DO
DESCRIPTION: The available 34-speaker Bose Panaray audio system immerses you in pure sound with innovative technologies.

TITLE: SURROUND YOURSELF WITH SAFETY FEATURES
DESCRIPTION: With the Driver Awareness Package,† add peace of mind to every drive. The package includes: Safety Alert Seat, Forward Collision Alert, Following Distance Indicator, Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning, Front Pedestrian Braking, Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert, Rear Cross Traffic Alert, Low Speed Forward Automatic Braking and heated, power-folding mirrors.

TITLE: GAIN PRECIOUS TIME
DESCRIPTION: Up to certain speeds, available Forward and Reverse Automatic Braking† can sense imminent forward and reverse collisions and can automatically engage the brakes, if you have not already done so, helping to reduce the severity of the collision. The system may even help avoid a collision at very low speeds.

TITLE: REVERSE WITH CONFIDENCE
DESCRIPTION: When backing out of a parking space, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert warns of oncoming cross traffic from either side of your vehicle with a visible alert and a pulse from the available Safety Alert Seat.

TITLE: CARBON FIBER ACCENTS
DESCRIPTION: The best of bold worlds, the CT6-V delivers the luxury you expect from a Cadillac with the exhilarating performance of the V-Series. Every inch of carbon fiber is a reminder that you’re experiencing the pinnacle of style and performance.

TITLE: CONNECTIVITY
DESCRIPTION: A rare breed, the CT6-V is both athletic and intelligent with seamless technology and an infotainment† system that connects you to your world.

TITLE: PERFORMANCE GAUGES
DESCRIPTION: The performance gauge cluster with V badge and configurable displays is designed to awaken your inner race car driver. Ready, set, gone.

TITLE: AGGRESSIVE DESIGN
DESCRIPTION: A bold, black mesh sport grille has been designed to make an aggressive statement on any road. The CT6-V has mechanical limited-slip rear differential to increase traction and performance for spirited and track driving.

TITLE: ICONIC STYLE
DESCRIPTION: Strength and style are complemented by a powerful stance and iconic vertical lighting. The CT6-V is powerfully breaking free of tradtition.

TITLE: V-SERIES
DESCRIPTION: With the trademark V badge, the CT6-V joins the most advanced Cadillac vehicles the world has ever seen. Welcome to the V family.

TITLE: V-SERIES SPLIT 5-SPOKE ALLOY WHEEL
DESCRIPTION: Paired with summer only tires†, the V-Series Split 5-Spoke alloy wheels give you the best performance.

TITLE: SURROUND YOURSELF WITH SAFETY
DESCRIPTION: Features such as; Lane Change Alert† with Side Blind Zone Alert†, Forward Collision Alert†, and Front Pedestrian Braking† add peace of mind to every drive.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Up to certain speeds, available Forward and Reverse Automatic Braking† can sense imminent forward and reverse collisions and can automatically engage the brakes.
